summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件使用户能够使用可视月历显示来选择日期。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件允许用户选择使用以可视方式显示的日期。The control allows the user to select a date using a visual display. 你可以限制日期和时间，可以通过设置选择和属性。You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 你可以通过设置更改控件的日历部分的查找范围， ， ， ， ，和属性。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > 控件仅支持公历日历。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. > [!NOTE] > 控件仅支持公历日历。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 控件绘制由操作系统，因此永远不会引发事件。The control is drawn by the operating system, so the event is never raised. 如果你需要提供自定义信息，请参阅控件，应重写方法，调用基实现的，然后执行自定义绘制。If you need to provide a customized look to the control, you should override the method, call the base implementation of , and then perform custom painting. 如果你需要自定义日期格式设置和选择限制为只用于一个日期，则可以考虑使用而不是控制。If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a control instead of a . 使用措施来减少你需要验证日期/时间值。Using the eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values. 有关详细信息月月历控件，请参阅[月日历控件引用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含显示一个日历年的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ， ，和可自定义日历控件的外观属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性，如， ，和设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还将， ， ，和属性来更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. summary.span: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
A that represents the background color of the control.
The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值设置为`true`。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置和的默认系统颜色的控件。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你拥有与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如或，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的实例提供正确值， ，和 < System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role > 属性。The instance returned by this method provides correct values for the , , and properties. 新值属性是的新值属性是当前的选择，以及新的默认值为属性是类型名称。The new value for the property is , the new value for the property is the current selection, and the new default value for the property is the type name. 选项仅适用于应用程序的编译为面向.NET Framework 4.7.1 或，选择添加.NET Framework 4.7.1 中使用的兼容性开关的.NET Framework 可访问性功能。The is only available in applications that are recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or that opt in to the .NET Framework accessibility features added in the .NET Framework 4.7.1 by using a compatibility switch. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的 Windows 窗体部分[重定目标更改为.NET Framework 4.7 从迁移到 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms)。For more information, see the Windows Forms section in [Retargeting Changes for Migration from .NET Framework 4.7 to 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

span.span: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
The foreground of the control.
The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置和的默认系统颜色的控件。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例要求你拥有与至少一个子控件; 但是，子容器控制，如或，与它自己的子控件将更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为月历控件获取或设置选定的日期范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the selected range of dates for a month calendar control.

value.span: ，带有选定范围的开始日期和结束日期。

span.span: A with the start and end dates of the selected range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性在功能上等效于使用方法。Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the method. 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期或属性。You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the or properties. 你无法通过设置更改的开始和结束日期或属性值的属性。You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the or property values of the property. 应使用， ，或。You should use , , or . 如果属性值大于其属性值，将交换日期;属性值将成为开始日期，和属性值将成为结束日期。If the property value of the is greater than its property value, the dates are swapped; the property value becomes the starting date, and property value becomes the end date. > [!NOTE] > 滚动显示日历导航按钮，选择一个范围时可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved). 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动到年 3 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001. 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001. > [!NOTE] > 设置为已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。Setting the for a control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法在功能上等效于设置属性。Using this method is functionally equivalent to setting the property. 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期或属性。You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the or property. 如果你设置`date1`参数大于`date2`参数，这两个日期设置为`date1`值。If you set the `date1` parameter greater than the `date2` parameter, both dates are set to the `date1` value. > [!NOTE] > 滚动显示日历导航按钮，选择一个范围时可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved). 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动日历回滚更改所选的范围，如下所示： 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001. 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围： 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001. > [!NOTE] > 设置为已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。Setting the for a control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 周的日期文本的字体颜色取决于属性。The font color of the days-of-the-week text depends on the property. 设置等于为显示主日历区会导致不可读的星期多少天文本。Setting the equal to the for the main display area of the calendar causes the days-of-the-week text to become unreadable. 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含显示一个日历年的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ， ，和可自定义日历控件的外观属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性，如， ，和设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还将， ， ，和属性来更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当显示日历时，某些日期早于，某些按照完全显示的月份。When the calendar is displayed, some dates precede and some follow the months that are fully displayed. 使用属性，您可以修改这些日期的文本颜色。Using the property, you can modify the color of the text for those dates. 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含显示一个日历年的控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ， ，和可自定义日历控件的外观属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性，如， ，和设置为自定义的日期将以粗体显示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 该示例还将， ， ，和属性来更改日历格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/CPP/monthcalendar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/CS/monthcalendar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/VB/monthcalendar.vb#1)]
